mapper.insert:

animal_id,
species,
growth_stage,
health_status,
farm,
feed_log_id,

mapper.update:
update animal
species = #{species,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
growth_stage = #{growthStage,jdbcType=TINYINT},
health_status = #{healthStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
farm = #{farm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feed_log_id = #{feedLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where animal_id = #{animalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update animal set species = #{species,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_stage = #{growthStage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, health_status = #{healthStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, farm = #{farm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feed_log_id = #{feedLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where animal_id = #{animalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
